Translations.Text: meselu-lcenneti-lleti vu`ide-lmuttekun. tecri min tahtihe-l'enhar. ukuluha daimuv vezilluha. tilke `ukbe-llezine-ttekav. ve`ukbe-lkafirine-nnar
vellezine ateynahumu-lkitabe yefrahune bima unzile ileyke vemine-l'ahzabi mey yunkiru ba`dah. kul innema umirtu en a`bude-llahe vela usrike bih. ileyhi ed`u veileyhi meab
vekezalike enzelnahu hukmen `arabiyya. veleini-tteba`te ehvaehum ba`de ma caeke mine-l`ilmi ma leke mine-llahi miv veliyyiv vela vak
velekad erselna rusulem min kablike vece`alna lehum ezvacev vezurriyyeh. vema kane lirasulin ey ye'tiye biayetin illa biizni-llah. likulli ecelin kitab
yemhu-llahu ma yesau veyusbit. ve`indehu ummu-lkitab
veim ma nuriyenneke ba`da-llezi ne`iduhum ev neteveffeyenneke feinnema `aleyke-lbelagu ve`aleyne-lhisab
evelem yerav enna ne'ti-l'arda nenkusuha min atrafiha. vellahu yahkumu la mu`akkibe lihukmih. vehuve seri`u-lhisab
vekad mekera-llezine min kablihim felillahi-lmekru cemi`a. ya`lemu ma teksibu kullu nefs. veseya`lemu-lkuffaru limen `ukbe-ddar
